title: Nexus 5X and Nexus 6P packaging leaks | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Nexusboxes]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * **Related:[Best Android Smartphones 2015](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-android-phones-1_round-up)**Google will officially unveil the new Nexus 5X and the Nexus 6P at an event tobe held on September 29 – that’s next Tuesday.Also likely to appear at the event are further details concerning Android 6.0Marshmallow, a new Nexus tablet, and a revamped version of the GoogleChromecast.**Check out our smartphone buyer’s video guide below:**
